channel.title: Error with making shops
channel.description:
I'm trying to make shops I edit client.java shops.cfg and autospawn.cfg
My client.java [code] } else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68;[/code]
Autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 520 3221 3218 0 0 0 0 0 1 jks[/code] This has no spaces except the start rest are tabs same for shops.cfg
Shops.cfg [code]shop = 68 Shop Name 2 2 391 100 4151 1000[/code] This has no spaces except the start rest are tabs same for autospawn.cfg
Compiles correctly. I can login but when i click trade on the shopkeeper then it dc's me. When i click talk nothing happens. And this is the error in the run.bat when i get dc [code]Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 61779. Client type: high memory version UserId: 13661280 shayde is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-shayde]: Loading finished. [b]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -23 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19314) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18011) at client.packetSending(client.java:17964) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/b] Game saved for player shayde ClientHandler: Client shayde disconnected. Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 61780. Client type: high memory version UserId: 13661280 shayde is signing onto server. LOADED: 3[/code]
The thing in bold is the main part so can someone please help me What am i doing wrong And if it matters im using the Alstarscape v2 Source

item.title: Error with making shops
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

I’m trying to make shops
I edit client.java shops.cfg and autospawn.cfg

My client.java

} else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68;

Autospawn.cfg

spawn = 520	3221	3218	0	0	0	0	0	1	jks

This has no spaces except the start rest are tabs same for shops.cfg

Shops.cfg

shop = 68	Shop Name				2	2	391	100	4151	1000

This has no spaces except the start rest are tabs same for autospawn.cfg

Compiles correctly.
I can login but when i click trade on the shopkeeper then it dc’s me. When i click talk nothing happens.
And this is the error in the run.bat when i get dc

Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 61779. Client type: high memory version UserId: 13661280 shayde is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-shayde]: Loading finished. [b]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -23 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19314) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18011) at client.packetSending(client.java:17964) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/b] Game saved for player shayde ClientHandler: Client shayde disconnected. Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 61780. Client type: high memory version UserId: 13661280 shayde is signing onto server. LOADED: 3

The thing in bold is the main part
so can someone please help me
What am i doing wrong
And if it matters im using the Alstarscape v2 Source

Read full topic
